basics.name: Ellidie Salladay
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Ellidie is from Spokane, Washington and is earning her degree in Visual Communication Design with UX certification at Eastern Washington University.

work.summary: The Program Leading to University Success (PLUS) provides FREE academic support to EWU students through collaborative study groups, individualized tutoring, and online academic assistance. Peers work with other peers in the Learning Commons of JFK Library and in classrooms across campus. Services are provided to students by professional staff and student employees in order to support the achievement of their academic and career goals. PLUS is certified by the College Reading and Learning Association (CRLA) to provide internationally recognized tutor training.

volunteer.summary: Juniors and seniors in high school attend college courses on the EWU campus

Club Treasurer and acting Secretary for the Eastern Social Dancers Club at Eastern Washington University. I managed the club's revenue and fundraising and hosted dance events as well as dance practices.

awards.title: Dean's List Fall 2017 - 2018
awards.summary: Dean's Honor List under the College of Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics

references.name: MaryAlice C. Gumaer MBA
references.reference: Ellidie is a very intelligent individual, and yet at the same time remains very “grounded” and astute in day to day operations of a business and life in general.  I have found that Ellidie can assimilate new material quickly and apply it with little error.
